description: With cushioning on the entire bottom of the foot, the Classic Hike Light Cushion Solid Crew sock offers both comfort and a secure fit. With a classic look, classic styling, and classic colors, this hiking sock looks as good as it feels. And, as with all of their products, it’s made in the U.S.A. from imported yarn. With these socks on your feet, you’ll be ready to hit your next trail in style.
name: Smartwool Hike Classic Edition Light Cushion Solid Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 69% Merino Wool, 18% Recycled Nylon, 10% Nylon, 2% Polyester, 1% Elastane
